attributes.action: Replace all job centre staff with untrained monkeys for a week and see if they show more respect and create a rapore with job seekers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Job seekers are continually treated with suspicion and contempt by job centre staff, who have less humanity than certain african dictators.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
